Location

Venue

River Pool & Sports Bar: 19 NW 5th Ave, Downtown Portland

River is easily accessible by public transit and offers a welcoming atmosphere for players and spectators alike.

Free Pool: First come, first served for practice before the tournament.

Transportation

MAX Light Rail

Two MAX Light Rail stations are located within a short walk of the venue:

  • NW 5th & Couch: Served by the Green, Orange, and Yellow MAX lines, as well as the Blue and Yellow bus lines.
  • NW 6th & Davis: Also served by the Green, Orange, and Yellow MAX lines, plus Blue and Yellow bus lines.

Other Options

Lime Scooters: Lime scooters are commonly parked throughout downtown Portland. Use the Lime app to locate and unlock a scooter nearby.

Uber: Launch the Uber app or visit their site to request a ride to River.

Lyft: Launch the Lyft app or visit their site to request a ride to River.

Nearby Parking Map

Use the interactive map below to locate nearby parking next to River.

Parking

  • On-street metered parking: Available throughout downtown Portland. Always check signage for time limits and payment details.
  • SmartPark Garages: Several city-operated garages are nearby. Visit the Portland Parking Guide for locations and rates.
  • Private lots: Additional paid lots and garages are within walking distance. Availability and prices may vary.
